The development of 1nformatlon media in Africa
A meeting of experts on the development of information media in
Africa Is to be held at Casablanca, from 24 January to 6 February
1962, as a follow-up to those already held in Bangkok, in
January I960, for South-East Asia, and in Santiago, Chile, in
February 1961, for Latin America.
These meetings form part of the survey Unesco has undertaken at
the request of the United Nations on the development of information
media in the less developed countries. Member States or Associate
Members of Unesco, which are also Members or Associate Members of
the Economic Commission for Africa, can be represented at the
Casablanca meeting by experts in the fields of press, film, radio
and television."
